awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 10 nominations.

fullplot: Connie Sumner has a loving husband, a beautiful home, and a wonderful son, but she wants more. When she's approached one day by a handsome stranger while trying to hail a taxi, she becomes obsessed with him and eventually starts an affair. But her selfish actions soon catch up with her...
plot: A New York suburban couple's marriage goes dangerously awry when the wife indulges in an adulterous fling.
title: Unfaithful

tomatoes.consensus: Diane Lane shines in the role, but the movie adds nothing new to the genre and the resolution is unsatisfying.
